alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 24 at 8:50AM CDT until April 27 at 1:23PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...From Monday evening to early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, moderate flooding of agricultural lands occurs between Shady Point and Arkoma. Williams Road east of Panama and some local farm roads are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 32.8 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
